game.name: Saints Row: The Third - Unlockable Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Unlockable Pack gives access to all unlockable items, upgrades and bonuses that weren't chosen during normal gameplay. Now you can have it all!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Unlockable Pack gives access to all unlockable items, upgrades and bonuses that weren't chosen during normal gameplay. Now you can have it all!
